page.title: 14CHANGES IN AREA
page.content:
Prior to the Second World War (1939-45) the area was an agricultural region. The post war period has seen a marked increase in{population,}many of whom{commute}to London. This has increased house prices and it is hard for young people or those on low wages to buy accommodation. In June 1985 it was announced that {Stansted}would become the 3rd. London {Airport,}and this will cause: increased house prices;large increase in population; loss of agricultural land of high value;much increase in noise and road traffic. This decision followed 20 years and 3 public enquiries.
A.Heath,G.Bird,D.Owen,S.Rush.
